title: Spontaneity vs. Planning

questions.text: When we have a weekend with nothing planned, I feel...
choices: Excited - let's see what happens!
A bit restless without something on the calendar
Relieved - we could use the downtime
Eager to fill it with something fun
Other / It depends

questions.text: When we're getting ready for a trip together, I'd prefer we...
choices: Pack last minute - we'll figure it out
Make a shared packing list ahead of time
Each do our own thing but start a day or two early
Plan everything together, down to the details
Other / It depends

questions.text: If something fun comes up last minute (friends inviting us out, a spontaneous trip), I hope we...
choices: Say yes! Let's do it
Quickly check in with each other and decide
Think about it - I usually need a bit of notice
Probably pass unless it's really special
Other / It depends

questions.text: When it comes to planning our time together, I'd like us to...
choices: Keep it loose and decide day by day
Have a rough idea but stay flexible
Schedule date nights and quality time in advance
Share a calendar so we always know what's coming
Other / It depends

questions.text: For a date night out, I'd prefer we...
choices: Wander and pick somewhere that looks good
Have a couple options in mind but decide when we're out
Make a reservation so we know what to expect
Research and pick the perfect spot ahead of time
Other / It depends

description: Discover your approach to plans and spontaneity together.
